channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: グーグル最高事業責任者が「YouTube TVは好調」と発言、YouTube TVの国際展開を「綿密に検討している」（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
Google Chief Business Officer says “YouTube TV is doing well”, and the company is “closely looking” at an international expansion of YouTube TV  —  Google execs are actively considering an international expansion of pay-TV service YouTube TV, Chief Business Officer Philipp Schindler …

item.title: ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙が、記者の専門知識や倫理観、活動方法などを紹介する「エンハンスド・バイオ」と呼ばれる新しい形式を、傍線ページに導入（ニューヨーク・タイムズ社）。
item.description:
The New York Times Company:
The New York Times introduces a new format to its byline pages, called enhanced bios, highlighting journalists' expertise and ethics, how they operate, and more  —  The New York Times is introducing a new format to its byline pages.  —  Our journalists are what set The New York Times apart.

item.title: AlphabetのCEOによると、YouTube PremiumやYouTube TVを含むデジタルサブスクリプションサービスの年間売上は$150Bに達しており、2019年から5倍に増加している（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Alphabet CEO says its digital subscription services, including YouTube Premium and YouTube TV, are on a $15B annual revenue run rate, up fivefold since 2019  —  Alphabet's suite of digital subscription services — including YouTube Premium, YouTube Music, YouTube TV and Google One cloud storage …

item.title: 仏メディア複合企業ビベンディ、映画・テレビスタジオ「カナル＋」を含む4つの別会社への分割を正式提案（ブルームバーグ）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
French media conglomerate Vivendi formally proposes splitting into four separately traded companies, including one for the film and TV studio Canal+  —  - Vivendi has complained about its stock trading at a discount  — Canal+ is largest unit, accounting for more than half of sales

item.title: アルファベット、第4四半期のグーグル広告収入は前年同期比11％増の655億ドル（予想661億ドル）、グーグル検索・その他収入は同13％増の480億ドル（ロイター
item.description:
Reuters:
Alphabet reports Q4 Google advertising revenue up 11% YoY to $65.5B, vs. $66.1B estimated, with Google Search & other revenue up 13% YoY to $48B  —  Alphabet (GOOGL.O) disappointed Wall Street on Tuesday as holiday season advertising sales came in below expectations and overshadowed …

item.title: タレントエージェンシーWMEがテック系スタートアップVermillioと提携、AI技術による画像追跡でWMEクライアントを肖像権やIPの盗難から守る（Nicole Sperling/New York Times）
item.description:
Nicole Sperling / New York Times:
Talent agency WME partners with tech startup Vermillio to protect WME clients from thefts of their likeness and IP by using AI technology to track images  —  WME said the partnership would help its clients get fake images of themselves removed or receive compensation for use of their likenesses.

item.title: YouTubeの2023年第4四半期の広告収入は前年同期比15.5％増の92億ドルとほぼ予想通り、2022年第4四半期の広告売上は約8％減（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
YouTube Q4 2023 ad revenue rose 15.5% YoY to $9.2B, roughly in line with expectations; in Q4 2022, YouTube's ad sales fell almost 8%  —  Q4 ad revenue for YouTube came in at $9.20 billion, roughly in line with Wall Street expectations, continuing the momentum from the third quarter of last year.

item.title: ロサンゼルス・タイムズ暫定編集長テリー・タンがヘクター・ベセラを編集長に指名、ベセラは1999年にタイムズに入社（Meg James/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Meg James / Los Angeles Times:
The Los Angeles Times Interim Executive Editor Terry Tang names Hector Becerra as the paper's managing editor; Becerra joined The Times in 1999  —  Veteran Los Angeles Times journalist Hector Becerra has been named managing editor of the newspaper.  —  Interim Executive Editor Terry Tang announced …

item.title: アイオワ大学の独立系学生新聞「デイリー・アイオワン」が、マウント・バーノン・リスボン・サン紙とソロン・エコノミスト紙の2つの週刊地方紙を購入（Hanaa' Tameez/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Hanaa' Tameez / Nieman Lab:
The Daily Iowan, the University of Iowa's independent student newspaper, purchases two weekly local newspapers, the Mount Vernon-Lisbon Sun and Solon Economist  —  Student journalists in Iowa will now have more chances to hone their reporting skills while strengthening local news.

item.title: 米商工会議所、ブロードバンド・サービスへのアクセスにおけるデジタル差別を防止する規則が過度に広範であるとして、その覆滅を求めてFCCを提訴（David Shepardson/Reuters）
item.description:
David Shepardson / Reuters:
The US Chamber of Commerce sues the FCC to overturn rules that prevent digital discrimination in access to broadband services, saying that they are overly broad  —  The U.S. Chamber of Commerce and two Texas business groups sued the Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday seeking …

item.title: 情報筋ネルソン・ペルツのTrianは、ESPN+とNetflixのようなスポーツに関心を持つより大きなプレーヤーとのバンドルなど、Disneyへの提言を発表する予定。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Nelson Peltz's Trian plans to publish its recommendations for Disney, including bundling ESPN+ with a larger player interested in sports, like Netflix  —  Peltz's Trian Fund Management LP will publish a so-called white paper detailing its investment thesis and recommendations …

item.title: The Anklerがエグゼクティブ・エディターにデイヴィッド・リドスキーを起用し、LAistのラジオ局、ウェブサイト、ソーシャルメディアアカウントにAnklerのレポートを提供する契約を締結（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
The Ankler hires David Lidsky as executive editor and signs a deal to bring Ankler reporting to LAist's radio station, website, and social media accounts  —  The Ankler, the entertainment media startup from veteran Hollywood editor Janice Min and insider columnist Richard Rushfield …

item.title: NYTがニュースルームでジェネレーティブAIの活用を模索するチームの募集を開始「報道やタイムズの読者への見せ方を支援する」（Emilia David/The Verge）
item.description:
Emilia David / The Verge:
The NYT starts hiring for a team that will explore the use of generative AI in the newsroom “to help with reporting and how the Times is presented to readers”  —  The New York Times will begin building a team to explore the use of generative AI in its newsroom.

item.title: The Players' Tribuneを所有するMinute Mediaは、CEOによると10億ドル以上の評価額で「数千万ドル」を調達し、スポーツストリーミングサービスのSTN Videoを買収した（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Minute Media, owner of The Players' Tribune, raised “tens of millions”, per its CEO, at a $1B+ valuation, and bought sports streaming service STN Video  —  Minute Media, the parent company to sports and entertainment sites like The Players' Tribune and Mental Floss …

item.title: オレゴニアン紙は、弁護士が誤って送った文書の情報を公開しないよう裁判所に命じられたが、事前抑制は1Aに反するとして上訴する予定（Matthew Kish/Oregonian）
item.description:
Matthew Kish / Oregonian:
The Oregonian plans to appeal a court order to not publish info from docs that a lawyer accidentally sent it, saying prior restraint goes against 1A  —  A federal judge on Friday ordered The Oregonian/OregonLive not to publish information from documents it obtained last week from an attorney …
